Hanoi, Oct 24 (IANS): Eighteen out of 20 monkeypox cases recorded in Vietnam's Ho Chi Minh City hace tested positive for HIV, the Department of Health has confirmed.
All 20 cases are being treated at the city's National Hospital of Tropical Diseases, Xinhua …
